# Benchmark 

Run methods
```{r, run methods, eval=TRUE}

datasets <- list(list(truth="none",
                      species="h", 
                      type="sim",
                      seqStyle="UCSC",
                      peakFile="../peaks/merged_peaks.narrowPeak",
                      folder="./data/data_baseline/",
                      readType="bed"))
names(datasets) <- "data_baseline"

runAll(datasets, scriptsFolder="../../../Scripts", 
       methods=c("chromVAR", "minaLisa.others", "monaLisa.zero", "StabSel", "fastMLM"), 
       forceRerun=TRUE)
```

benchmark results
```{r, compile benchmark, eval=FALSE}
# change name of TF
datasets <- lapply(datasets, function(ds){
  if(grepl("ZN", ds$truth))
  {
    ds$truth <- "ZN143"
  }
  ds
})

interactors <- readRDS("../Scripts/allInteractors.rds")
res <- compileBenchmark(datasets, interactors=interactors)
saveRDS(res, "res_all_effect_strength.rds")
```
